features: FACE TONER: Struggling with uneven skin and large pores? Super Skin Toner has got your back! Our toner improves the concentration of CoQ10 levels in skin cells, which helps protect against free radicals and other outside factors while aiding in tightening and brightening your skin.

NOURISH SKIN: Packed with skin-enhancing nutrients, this facial toner supports energy production in skin cells, nourishes to help skin maintain a healthy pH balance, and aids in rejuvenating and moisturizing skin. In addition, our pore-reducing toner is vegan and cruelty-free.

CLEAN INGREDIENTS: This non-drying facial toner for all skin types contains a variety of pore-clarifying and skin-soothing ingredients including witch hazel, hyaluronic acid, blood orange, CoQ10, as well as chamomile, sage, aloe vera, and cucumber extracts.

SUGGESTED USE: After cleansing with your favorite DIME cleanser, saturate a cotton ball or cotton pad with Super Skin Toner. Apply to the face in a circular motion. Avoid the eye area. For best results, follow with the application of a DIME serum and moisturizer.

THE DIME DIFFERENCE: At DIME Beauty, the difference is in the details. We stand apart with sustainable packaging, clean ingredients, vegan and cruelty-free formulas, and a focus on your well-being. In addition, each ingredient we use has a safe Environmental-Working-Group rating so you can use our products daily with confidence.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just what I was looking for in a toner!Great quality! Great price! Great results!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Update - better results without daily use
reviews.reviewText: Updated review: Previously I wrote a bad review for this toner because it irritated my dry and sensitive skin. Using it every day was a no-go for me. After I bought my usual toner, I realized I missed the exfoliation from this toner! Now I rotate this with my fenty fat water every other day and have found better results than if I were to use just one on its own. So if you have sensitive skin, maybe yse only a few times a week and other days use a more hydrating or gentle toner. I ended up using all of my first bottle despite my initial impression and am back to buy more!----------Original review: I wanted to try out a new toner and bought this one because of the positive reviews and clean ingredients. I used it for a month and was having skin irritation and acne beyond what is normal for me. I chalked it up to other recent lifestyle changes, but then tried using my usual toner again the other day and my skin cleared up within 24hrs. I must be sensitive or allergic to something in this product I wasn't aware of. I will stick to my fenty fat water from now on. I have very sensitive skin and that stuff is very soothing and does wonders. This dime stuff is not it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must have in your skin routine!!!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using DIME products for almost 2 years now and this is one that I can’t live without. I use it immediately after using the cleanser and it gets rid of any last traces of dirt or oil. Cannot recommend it enough!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Dime products for about 2 years now. The products are amazing. I had issues with my original order, but between with the help from Amazon and the seller all was fixed. Very satisfied with the service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m so glad to know Dime is on Amazon now! Love this product, great for my skin!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have tried several toners and for the money, this is the best one! I love DIME products, but this might be my favorite so far! I have combo leaning oily skin and this doesn't make it too dry or oily. I love that it has CoQ10 in it too and DIME is a clean brand with no harsh chemicals or toxins. I have gone through 3 bottles and I don't plan on stopping anytime soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just getting into Dime. Slowly switching over from a much more overly priced brand. So far it’s feels good and it’s soothing. Cleans extra debris off face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Dime has the very skin care I have ever used. I have never had a reaction to any of these products.
